Title: WCMF - Windows Content Management Framework
Description:
WCMF is a framework that allows one to build CMS appllications that target the Windows platform (whereas a typical CMS system is usually web based).
Used technologies are MEF, WCF, WPF (including Silverlight) and Caliburn.Micro.
